Welcome to the world
of harmony and inner balance

I help you find inner strength and confidence

About me

About me

My name is Toni Mrvič, and I am a personal and relationship counselor with years of experience in the fields of relationships, behavior, and emotions. My goal is to help you find inner balance, improve your quality of life, and discover your potential.

I believe that every person is unique and has immense resources to overcome life's challenges. My role is to support you on this journey and help you understand and accept yourself. You will learn how to manage your emotions and stress, and develop the skills you need to achieve inner harmony and build healthy relationships.

My Services

My Services

I start where you are right now without a predetermined plan

My goal in working with you is to understand your needs and get to the core of the issue. I use various methods to help you live a fulfilling life.

Contact me

Individual approach

Just you and me, overcoming personal unpleasant experiences together, processing them, maturing through them, and drawing lessons for the future.

Improving relations in the company

We strengthen relationships, resolve conflicts, and create a collaborative atmosphere.

Couples counseling

In a partnership approach, we get to know ourselves and our partner, understand primary family patterns, and connect more deeply emotionally.

Assistance with Stress and Grief

We will find ways to manage stress and work through the grieving process in a healthy way after a loss.

My skills

Why choose me?

Professionalism, discretion, an individual approach to each person, a focus on your needs, and proven effectiveness of my working methods.

Reviews

>
Nina Kovač

"I reached out to Toni at the lowest point in my life. With his help, I found myself and began living differently. He always says that I helped myself, but he guided me. I still turn to him for advice, and most importantly, I feel safe around him."

Peter in Maja Novak

"We met Toni at a seminar for couples. He convinced us with his simplicity and directness, so we arranged for online couples therapy. He created a trusting atmosphere, helping us recognize and work through our emotions. We liked his professionalism, directness, and relaxed approach. We recommend him."

Matej Potočnik

"Tony's counseling sessions have changed me in many ways. I have a different perspective on the past and have accepted the events of my youth as positive. I no longer resent my parents for their absence. After each therapy session, I felt relaxed and full of energy, even though it wasn't easy when you helped me confront the past."

Eva Krajnc

"Workplace bullying leaves you feeling isolated and unheard. At first, people think you are just overly sensitive, but over time, you realize that action is needed. Toni helped me calm down, understand the situation, and process it with his listening, empathy, and techniques."

Live and online

Process of work

  • 1

    First meeting

    In the first meeting, we will get to know your needs and you will experience my way of working. Then, you will decide if you want to continue the process.

  • 2

    Work method

    In 12 meetings, which take place once a week for 45-60 minutes, we will learn where and how we developed certain emotional responses, behavioral patterns, and expectations, and how we were emotionally imprinted.

  • 3

    Resolution

    After shedding light on unpleasant emotions, we will face them, acknowledge them, and create space for them to be expressed. Then we will soothe them, significantly reducing their intensity and their impact on the present.

  • 4

    Process evaluation

    At the end of the process, we will analyze together how much more at peace you feel with yourself and your past, and how freely you can create your present without being influenced by past experiences.
